# css-input

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Description

An input component that accepts a type and value as properties.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description     | Type     | Default     |
|----------|-----------|-----------------|----------|-------------|
| `type`   | `type`    | The input type  | `string` | `'text'`    |
| `value`  | `value`   | The input value | `string` | `undefined` |

## Usage

```html

<css-input type="text" value="Default text"></css-input>
```
